SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

com.google.gwt.gwtai.applet.client
Annotation Type JavaVersion

@Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface JavaVersion

The JavaVersion Annotation specifies a which JRE version is required to launch this Applet. This makes it possible to select a particular version of the JRE for an individual applet. The default behavior is to run on top of the latest available JRE on the system. Note: The java_version parameter requires the new Java Plug-In (>= 1.6.0_10) to work, older version will ignore it. If the new Java Plug-In is not present, then browser-specific mechanisms are needed, see here. The JavaVersion Annotation can be used to select:

  • A particular JRE version, e.g. "1.5.0_11"
  • A particular JRE family, e.g. "1.5*"
  • A particular JRE family or later, e.g. "1.5+"
This Annotation is optional. If no value is given, the respective parameter is simply omitted.

Author:
Adrian Buerki

Required Element Summary
 java.lang.String value
           
 

Element Detail

value

public abstract java.lang.String value
